items.sentence: Tom isn't the only one who has to study really hard. I have to study hard, too.
I'm convinced there are few people in this world who cook as well as Mary does.
I wouldn't say we've achieved our goal yet, but we're within striking distance.
The unsurmountable pressure from all directions was too much for Tom to handle.
Tom could feel Mary's head resting on his shoulder as they watched TV together.
